cosmos.question: I twinkle brightly at night, but I am not a star. I circle the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I have phases, sometimes full, sometimes a crescent.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🧀 People sometimes joke that I'm made of this food.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of hot gas that gives off light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot.
🌞 Earth orbits around me.
⚡ I am a star.

cosmos.question: I am the planet known as the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 The same colour as some chocolate
🚀 We have sent rovers to explore me.
👽 Some people wonder if life exists (or existed) on me.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system. I have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I'm like the king of the planets
🌀 The great red spot is a giant storm.
🪐 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of billions of stars, gas, and dust, held together by gravity. Our solar system is a part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 My name sounds like a type of chocolate bar.
🥛 I appear as a milky band of light in the night sky.
💫 I am a very, very large system.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am the second largest planet in our solar system.
💨 I am a gas giant

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a pattern in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 The Big Dipper is part of me
✨ People use me to navigate.
📜 Many have names from ancient stories.

cosmos.question: I am a dwarf planet found in the Kuiper Belt. I was once considered a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🐶 I share my name with a famous cartoon dog.
🧊 I am very far from the Sun.
🪐 I was reclassified in 2006.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps planets in orbit around the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Newton discovered me when something fell from a tree.
⚖️ I attract objects to each other.
🌍 I keep you on the ground.

cosmos.question: I am a supermassive region in the center of most galaxies, not even light can escape from me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have intense gravity.
🌀 Matter spirals into me.
🚫 Nothing can escape my pull.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and curved. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I grow on trees in warm places.
🟡 My peel is easy to remove.
🥣 I am often eaten as a snack.

food.question: I am white, cold, and sweet. I'm often served in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt in the sun.
🥄 You usually eat me with a spoon.
🍓 I come in many different flavors.

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on vines. I'm often in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I need lots of sunshine to grow.
🍅 I'm technically a fruit but often eaten like a vegetable.
🍕 I am used to make ketchup and pasta sauce.

food.question: I am long, orange, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a root vegetable.
💪 People say I'm good for your eyesight.
🥗 I'm often eaten raw or cooked.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast. I am baked in an oven. I am often sliced. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food in many countries.
🥪 You can make sandwiches with me.
🇫🇷 French toast is made from slices of me.

food.question: I am a grain that is cooked in water. I can be white or brown. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I'm a popular side dish in Asian cuisine.
🥘 I can be used in stir-fries, soups, and desserts.
🌾 I grow in paddies.

food.question: I am a drink made from crushed fruit. I can be sweet or tart. What am I?

hints.text: 🍹 I'm often served cold.
🍊 Orange and apple are popular flavors.
🥤 Some people like to add ice to me.

food.question: I am a savory dish made with ground meat and beans, often served in a bowl. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 I am often topped with cheese and sour cream.
🌶️ I am commonly flavored with chili powder.
🍲 I'm a hearty and warming meal.

food.question: I am a type of pasta that is shaped like small ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am an Italian pasta shape.
👂 My name means 'little ears' in Italian.
🥦 I often pair well with broccoli or sausage.

food.question: I am a complex sugar formed when glucose and fructose are joined together. I am commonly used in baking. What am I?

hints.text: 🍬 I make things sweet.
🎂 I am found in many desserts.
🌱 I can be derived from sugar cane or sugar beets.
